title: Pads viewer internet browser display using HTML5
abstract: This report contains all of the progress and results that were achieved during the graduation project internship in Net Display Systems Company. The graduation project is focused on the analyzing, research, and development of the product that has been being developed by the Company. The goal is to extend the capability of the Company’s product – digital signage software, to be able to display one of the Company’s software package displayer, namely-Viewer, to a multiple platform using the internet browsers. The later phases were allocated for implementing and developing codes and making the documentation. ICT skills and analytic skills play an important role in this project. There are methodologies used for tackling the project. The agile method and phasing method were used to organize and solve the project. In the end, documentations were produced including Final Report, Project Plan, Research Report, and Design Document. The documentations contain all necessary information regarding the whole components related to the project. The Final Report covers the project information from the start till the end in general with a structured content and a good flow of information.
source: Undergraduate Degree No. 01021175/INF/2012; Eldon Lesley Gandakusuma (26408038)
subjects: HTML (DOCUMENT MARKUP LANGUAGE); WEBSITE DESIGN; WEBSITE DEVELOPMENT
